about_the_game:
"

Unearthed Spoils Anthology One


Enjoy Unearthed Spoils volumes #001 - #005 complied into one massive module with additional content!



Unearthed Spoils Anthology One contains the following content:

  • ELEVEN CLASS ARCHETYPES - Such as the Circle of the Stones Druid, Oath of the Inquisitor Paladin, and the Umbral Numen Warlock
  • FIVE CHARACTER BACKGROUNDS - New backgrounds with personality traits, ideals, bonds, and flaws to help you craft engaging characters
  • TWENTY-ONE MAGICAL SPELLS - An expansive tome of new spells
  • SIXTY-EIGHT MAGIC ITEMS - Enjoy numerous new magic items of varying rarities, including 4 sentient items
  • SIXTY-FOUR MONSTERS - New creatures to engage your players who are seeking new challenges
  • FIVE EPIC ADVENTURES - Lengthy mid-level adventures with detailed battle maps, which make use of the monsters in this module
"
detailed_description:
"

Unearthed Spoils Anthology One


Enjoy Unearthed Spoils volumes #001 - #005 complied into one massive module with additional content!



Unearthed Spoils Anthology One contains the following content:

  • ELEVEN CLASS ARCHETYPES - Such as the Circle of the Stones Druid, Oath of the Inquisitor Paladin, and the Umbral Numen Warlock
  • FIVE CHARACTER BACKGROUNDS - New backgrounds with personality traits, ideals, bonds, and flaws to help you craft engaging characters
  • TWENTY-ONE MAGICAL SPELLS - An expansive tome of new spells
  • SIXTY-EIGHT MAGIC ITEMS - Enjoy numerous new magic items of varying rarities, including 4 sentient items
  • SIXTY-FOUR MONSTERS - New creatures to engage your players who are seeking new challenges
  • FIVE EPIC ADVENTURES - Lengthy mid-level adventures with detailed battle maps, which make use of the monsters in this module
"
